name: Puny World (Post-Jam Version)
description:
You are Ludarius, a lesser god.

You are a student at the Heavenly School for Divine Beings and Other Ghosty Things.

For your senior project, you are tasked with ruling a world for one year.

It shouldn't be too hard, right? It's such a small world.

For Ludum Dare 38 (Theme: A Small World), I created a goofy god-simulation game. Gameplay consists of answering the prayers of your followers.

This is the post-jam version of Puny World, meaning I've updated it a little since Ludum Dare.

For judging, play the original entry here:
https://joecowman.itch.io/puny-world
NOTE: After the judging period ends, this game will be moved to that URL.
